MINET

MINET is the computer club of The Mother's International School.

Each year, MINET organises its annual technology symposium, MINET X, attended by 300+ students, innovators, and aspiring entrepreneurs.

As President of the club, I was in charge of leading the team responsible for organising the entire event, from inviting reputed guest speakers and distinguished judges to online registration. In addition, I co-led the Design & Development team responsible for creating the website, web and mobile apps for the event, and a Django-based backend for the online hunt.

The site can be seen live here.
